This day commemorates a day when women were freed from back-alley abortions, from dying in a pool of blood in toilet stalls. This day commemorates the end of septic wards in hospitals, freeing them up for obstetric services and other related services for patients.
 
 This day commemorates a day when progress was made towards not vilifying unwed mothers and illegitamacy. This day marks a day of freedom and justice for women.
